item.title: Git commands to get you through the day
item.description: Since the start of the year, I’ve been running weekly workshops with Paddy Morgan at work. These have been fun sessions to run. Some have been chats, some demos etc. However, this week we ran a “Git 101” workshop. Weirdly, this was the most attended workshop we have run, with around 50 engineers joining throughout the hour session. This post covers what we ran through. Time allocation: 60 minutes
